PR Title: feat(headless): implement structured logging system with verbosity levels
PR Description: This pull request introduces a structured, color-coded logging system for headless mode execution, replacing the previous use of `log.Printf` with a configurable `Logger` that supports multiple verbosity levels. It updates the configuration files and codebase to support the new logging architecture, ensuring backward compatibility and improving the clarity and usefulness of execution logs.

**Logging System Implementation:**

* Added a new `Logger` struct with four verbosity levels (`quiet`, `normal`, `verbose`, `debug`), color-coded output, and methods for structured logging. The logger replaces all previous `log.Printf` calls in `executor.go` and integrates with the execution flow for user-facing and debug logs.
